pendant|(n)|mặt dây chuyền|Ví dụ:|The pendant is made of black pearl.
earring|(n)|bông tai, hoa tai|Ví dụ:|She has a pair of crystal earrings.
necklace|(n)|vòng cổ, dây chuyền|Ví dụ:|He bought her a diamond necklace.
bracelet|(n)|vòng tay|Ví dụ:|Her bracelet is attractive.
brooch|(n)|trâm|Ví dụ:|I saw a brooch on her head.
hair clip|(n)|kẹp tóc|Ví dụ:|Where is the hair clip?
wedding ring|(n)|nhẫn cưới|Ví dụ:|He gave her a diamond wedding ring.
jeweler|(n)|thợ kim hoàn|Ví dụ:|He is the best jeweler.
jewelry store|(n)|cửa hàng trang sức|Ví dụ:|He bought the pair of rings in his sister's jewelry store.
anklet|(n)|vòng chân|Ví dụ:|As a child, my father bought me an anklet.
noble|(adj)|quý giá|Ví dụ:|This is a noble necklace.
luxurious|(adj)|sang trọng|Ví dụ:|You have a very luxurious ring.
modern|(adj)|hiện đại|Ví dụ:|The jewelry store sells modern shape of jewelries.
suitable|(adj)|phù hợp, thích hợp|Ví dụ:|We need to find someone suitable to send as Corbett's replacement.
twinkle|(v)|lấp lánh|Ví dụ:|The diamond necklace twinkles.
bead|(n)|hạt, hột (của chuỗi hạt)|Ví dụ:|She ​wore a ​necklace of ​colorful ​wooden beads.
hair tie|(n)|dây cột tóc|Ví dụ:|My sister bought me two new hair ties.
pocket watch|(n)|đồng hồ bỏ túi|Ví dụ:|He has a very nice pocket watch.
tiepin|(n)|ghim cà vạt, kẹp cà vạt|Ví dụ:|How much is the tiepin?
precious stone|(n)|đá quý|Ví dụ:|He gave her a ring set with a precious stone.
